text: Willem King grett alle his trewe frend in alc thare scire thar Sainte Petre havet land inne and Gilberd abbod freondlice.
And icc cithe eow that icc wille that he habbe sace and socne, toll and theam, and alcne thef binnan his land marce se fangon, on strate and offe strate, and on allen thngen the thar upp aspringen.
And icc nelle that any mann any onsting habbe on any timen ofer his land ne ofer his menn buton se abbod to Sainte Petres neode.
